title: Chapter 1 - Physics Simulation in Gazebo
description: Welcome to Chapter 1 of the Digital Twin educational module! This chapter focuses on Gazebo physics simulation, which forms the foundational component of our digital twin system. Gazebo provides realistic physics simulation that accurately models the behavior of robots and their interactions with the environment.
